entry.title: Momma Stiles to the Fucking Rescue you Bunch of FailWolfs
entry.summary:
Author: Estra4

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,851Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 397

Summary: Stiles needed a break from Scott and his Allison hat (get it because he has his head so far up her ass... you know what, never mind, I know I’m funny).After the absolute shit show that was the warehouses everything, Stiles was ready to sleep. Unfortunately, that sleep was being impeded by the infestation that was the Hale Pack. From would be runaways sneaking into his house at all hours to trauma bond, to a not so dead Creeperwolf, an angst ridden previous lizard person, and newly borne banshee in the body of pre-existing queen bee, not to mention the newly christened curly haired pup and the raging eyebrowed Alpha; it was a wonder Stiles would ever get a break for the rest of summer.Though an Alpha pack turning up at the same time as wolf twins was purely a coincident – Stiles is sure, and the less said about human sacrifices the safer for his sanity.Stiles is starting to think he jinked himself when he said nothing ever happened in this town. Too fucking much was happening and Stiles would like a refund, thank you, because clearly his stereotypical small town was broken.

entry.title: Blood Moon Rising
entry.summary:
Author: Mikaelsonbich25

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,349Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 47

Summary: After their fight with Donovan, Stiles left Beacon Hills to find himself again. Along the way, he was found by Kol who took him in as his 'pet'.Five years later, Scott manages to finally find his lost best friend, but when he does, he realizes Stiles had changed more than he had ever expected. Unbeknownst to Stiles, he wasn't the only one who had changed over the years.ALL OF THESE CHARACTERS ARE ADULTS!! THERE IS NO UNDERAGE RELATIONSHIPS IN THIS!!

entry.title: Rabbit in Your Headlights
entry.summary:
Author: KatsatheGraceling

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,357Chapters: 12/17Kudos: 2,569

Summary: “Stiles?” Allison’s voice was frantic over the phone.Stiles immediately jolted upright in bed, clutching the cell close to his ear. “Allison? What’s the matter?”“Something’s wrong with Scott. I don’t—please, he’s acting—” she cut herself off.“Acting like what?” There was no answer. “Allison, like what?”“Possessed,” she whispered.  AU where Stiles was always a demon, and Scott is the one who gets possessed by the Nogitsune. Stiles is not happy about it.

entry.title: Stiles' Treasures
entry.summary:
Author: Ann_shawol24

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,902Chapters: 14/26Kudos: 82

Summary: Allison is about to have her child, but her birth brings more complications than expected. The baby wants the pack together and won't be born until she has it.Desperate, Scott decides to search for the person who was once his best friend, Stiles Stilinski, who one day just left town.Can they convince him to come back?Enter and find out.Originally published on Wattpad, April 2020 - Completed May 2020This story is just a translation of the original Spanish version on Wattpad; it's been in the works for a while.Both the translation and the original work are my own.

entry.title: My Almost Never
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,937Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 116

Summary: “No,” Stiles choked. “No, no, no - don’t you fucking dare.”   He pressed his hands to Derek’s chest, trying to feel something. Anything. A heartbeat. Breath. Warmth. His hands trembled.   “Come on, you stubborn asshole,” he whispered. “You don’t get to-” His voice cracked. “You don’t get to die.”   But Derek didn’t move.

entry.title: Through Ash and Time
entry.summary:
Author: PaperYue_8

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,980Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 41

Summary: Stiles Stilinski wakes up in the past with the weight of a future he refuses to let happen. The Hale fire, the deaths, the betrayals—he remembers it all. But fate isn’t so easily rewritten.Armed with knowledge, untamed power, and a sharp tongue, Stiles must navigate a past that isn’t quite how he remembers it. Derek Hale watches him too closely, Lydia Martin hears whispers of something *wrong*, and even Scott senses the shift in his best friend. The Nemeton isn’t done with him, and neither is the past.Stiles came back to save them—but the more he changes, the more reality bends around him. And he’s not sure if he's fixing things… or breaking them beyond repair.

entry.title: Demon on His Shoulders
entry.summary:
Author: Mekanamin02

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,982Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 16

Summary: An unstoppable scream wrenches its way out of the demon as the feeling overpowers every sense in his body. He knows he’s gripping the woman’s arm too tightly, but he can’t seem to care when it feels like his core is igniting from within.Somewhere on the other side of the county, a boy gasps awake beside a hospital bed. There’s beeping behind him, loud, counting down. He sighs and stands, rolls his heavy shoulders and got to work, not realising he has a demon riding on his shoulders now. A demon his grandmother traded her life to protect him.**************Loner demon lord, Derek Hale just wants a quiet day to himself. One day, is all he asks. But one moment he's at home and the next he's standing in front of a frail old lady jumping to make a demon deal with him. He REALLY doesn't want to accept the deal but... circumstances. So now he's inserting himself into the life of a certain Stiles Stilinski to play his part but perhaps this will be a deal of Derek's millennia-long existence that he will never forget.

entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,055Chapters: 8/75Kudos: 17

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.

entry.title: Frozen Lines
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 71,572Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 51

Summary: The ice was his sanctuary. His home.But outside the rink, everything was war.Stiles carried a past full of pain—silent wounds no one could see. And Derek, the unyielding captain of the basketball team, was the last person he wanted to face.Enemies bound by pride, secrets, and unspoken grudges.In a town where trust shatters like thin ice, their collision is inevitable.Can two broken souls break down the walls between them? Or will the fight destroy everything, including what they never expected to find: each other?The ice will always be his sanctuary. But maybe, for the first time, the battle is worth fighting off the rink.

entry.title: Home is where trouble goes
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,475Chapters: 12/30Kudos: 1,181

Summary: Nine years ago, Stiles Stilinski left Beacon hills and never looked back. Nine years ago, Stiles Stilinski joined a new pack under the tutelage of a fellow spark. Five years ago, he survived the massacre of his pack by simple chance, leaving him with the children of his alpha in his custody.Nine years ago, Stiles vowed to never return to Beacon Hills. What happens when he finds out his children have decided to go sneaking their way to the hell mouth to know his past?(Or the Beacon Hills pack meet a pair of strange twins who claim to be investigating their own father.)

entry.title: Book 1: The Triskele / Book 2: The Mischief / Book 3(A/B): The Triskele and the Mischief
entry.summary:
Author: Solinvictus22

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 77,756Chapters: 31/?Kudos: 27

Summary: (FIXED AND EDITED; UNTIL CHAPTER 30)Trilogy wrapped into one:Book 1: Nemes(plural, pronounced nim/s) are people naturally born with connection to the primordial energies of the Earth enabling them to cast magic, Stiles is born a Neme and so is the prince he guards, while they have the war on their heads, against Neme-hunters of Edenia, humans who unlocked the science that may end the age of magic users.Book 2: Stiles' life turned upside down after engaging himself with dark magic, unknowingly the consequence of his actions weights more dreadful than just losing his light magic: the birth of the MischiefBook 3A: With the royalties and soldier mages reunited, they must finally face their greatest common enemy, Deucalion and his cult.Book 3B: Argesh has distracted itself by its inner conflict, Edenia has hibernated long enough to reinforce their anti magic tech to swoop the magical kingdoms with its storm.
